data.message: Why not a Homeless in San Francisco, and a Homeless in LA? Why  not highlight the good in our hearts, and find people in other cities like Rex. Maybe he is a rare unselfish person, but there are others out there like him, I am sure.

replies.message: Homeless in Seattle is working with several cities across the country to replicate the work. It's one of their goals for this coming year - to make that easier for those who want to do that.
There are many wonderful people & organizations that give big donations to lots of places in need, we just hear about it in the news.
Please AnnMarie Rockwell l support what you are saying about many people & organizations giving big donations to
They give with two hearts because every nonprofit which deals the homeless especially children whom parents died
My hometown is Kansas City. Homeless in KC came to mind..💓
